title: SimpleNotes
description: Shareable notes and checklists for households. Fully serverless on AWS with React frontend, FastAPI backend on Lambda, DynamoDB, Supabase Auth, CloudFront CDN, and Terraform IaC. CI/CD via GitHub Actions with staging/production environments.

title: BabyLog
description: Baby tracking app with FastAPI + SQLAlchemy backend on AWS Lambda, React frontend with Framer Motion, offline-first PWA. Full serverless infrastructure with API Gateway, CloudFront, custom domain with ACM certificates, and automated deployments.

title: HeyVoice
description: Voice Clone as a Service. FastAPI backend with Qwen3-TTS on Apple Silicon, React frontend, S3 audio storage, Stripe payments, gift codes system. Runs AI inference locally â€” zero cloud GPU costs. Full Terraform infrastructure.

title: Rosewood UI
description: A design system with CSS components, React wrappers, and PySide6/Qt components. Used across SimpleNotes, BabyLog, and HeyVoice for consistent UI. Published as npm packages with dark-first design.

title: Anvil
description: A Rust-based package manager for VFX/Animation pipelines. YAML-based package definitions, automatic dependency resolution, DCC launcher with correct environment setup. Cross-platform, resolves in milliseconds.

title: OpenGrid
description: Lightweight production tracking alternative to ShotGrid. Python SDK, FastAPI REST API, and React dashboard with Rosewood UI. Track assets, shots, tasks, and versions.

title: USD Asset Resolver
description: Production-ready asset resolution for USD pipelines. Rust-powered core with PyO3 bindings, LRU caching, SQLite backend, version resolution, and PySide6 visual browser.
